name: Tales from Danger's Den
description:
Tales from Danger's Den randomly generates small retro RPGs.

Keyboard controls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • ENTER or SPACE to confirm
  • ESC to cancel, or open field menu.
  • LSHIFT to dash

This game is participating in Feedback Fest! Please tell me what you think: what do you like, and what needs improvement?

While this is largely my solo project, I gratefully acknowledge and credit:

  • Aaron Wilson (AAW Music), boss battle music
  • Terra Bunn, puffball creature designs
  • Tyruswoo, plugin development (Event AI, Message Control, and Screenshot Snapper)
  • David Bau, code library (seedrandom
